message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll really love. I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $85 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. $85 just isn't enough for me. How about we split the difference and I come down to $92.50? This would be a fair deal for both of us.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product, which I believe is a fair compromise considering its value.
